column1: I have never read a book like this before
I do not believe that a book like this has ever been written before
I won't describe it to you
But get prepared to stick with the read as you realize that this one sentence runs for over two hundred pages
I know: you are used to simple sentences
You will find this a challenge
column2: similar to climbing a cliff face with only your fingernails

column1: No ledges to get a respite
column2: no markers outlining the next segment of the climb

column1: Only the inability to lose your grip
column2: only the compunction to climb to the very summit

column3: it's a climb like no other

column1: It's a reading journey you've never had
And probably will never have again
